# edgecenter_availability_zone (Data Source)

Represent Availability Zones

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "edgecenter" {
  permanent_api_token = "29422$4ceea35....1513a61c87c68809a4"
}

data "edgecenter_region" "rg" {
  name = "ED-10 Preprod"
}

data "edgecenter_availability_zone" "region_az" {
  region_id = data.edgecenter_region.rg.id
}

output "availability_zones" {
  value = data.edgecenter_availability_zone.region_az.availability_zones
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `region_id` (Number) The ID of the region. Either 'region_id' or 'region_name' must be specified.
- `region_name` (String) The name of the region. Either 'region_id' or 'region_name' must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `availability_zones` (List of String) A list of availability zones in the region.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
